bug.author: iinntteerrnn
bug.description:
Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Hi, I can't find the skip button on my local project I have never been like this and i don't know how to activate the skip button How can I activate it? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70555571/97382351-8960ef80-190e-11eb-9c88-a9b86215dfae.png></denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....' See error
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. iOS] Browser [e.g. chrome, safari] Version [e.g. 22]
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: On what page did you try to find the skip button?

On what page did you try to find the skip button?
On Task tab. but Nikolai Liubimov told me about latest update on Slack, thanks
